name: The Judge's Chambers
description:
You are in a small room that is filled with legal tombs.  There is a
small desk here, literally buried under legal documents.  There is also
a small window overlooking the northern part of the city.

exits.description: The courtroom lies in that direction.
exits.keywords: door~ 1 12039 12050 E tombs books~ The books are very large and filled with Roman legal precedent.
